traits.name: Evasion
entries: If Hlam is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's {@condition incapacitated}.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Hlam is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Hlam attacks three times using his unarmed strike, darts, or both.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 ({@dice 1d10 + 7}) bludgeoning, magic damage. If the target is a creature, Hlam can choose one of the following additional effects:
The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (Hlam's choice).
The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of Hlam's next turn.

actions.name: Dart
entries: Ranged atk +12 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 9 (1d4 + 7 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Quivering Palm {@recharge}
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. The target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is reduced to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the target takes 55 (10d10 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Wholeness of Body (Recharges after a Long Rest)

legendary.name: Quick Step
entries: Hlam moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Invisibility (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Hlam becomes {@condition invisible} until the end of his next turn. The effect ends if Hlam attacks or casts a spell.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Hlam is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks) He has the following cleric spells prepared:
